Early Horn Recordings (1900-1950)

The First Horn Players To Play For The Future

The end of the 19th century saw the invention of the recorded sound. Horn players, like pianists and singers beforehand, started to play on recordings, first as part of orchestras, but soon also as soloist. This website aims to present some of these recordings, highlighting the great stylistical differences with our era.
